title: Looking for a Silver 3+ Mid Laner
body:
Team **Dark Vengeance** is looking for a Mid Laner (Silver 3+) for the upcoming RFLAN tournament.


*__*


**Requirements:**
- Live in WA
- Able to attend [RFLAN](http://www.rflan.org/) (July 9th - 10th)
- Working Microphone
- Discord
- Able to practice at least 3 times a week.


*__*


Add me in game (DV Eilea) and we'll see how well we stack up as a team! 

Thanks all!
